description: This layer shows the  distribution and benefits accrued through  Coastal Protection in the NMC region. Distribution of  Coastal Protection value in the NMC region is measured in  million USD per year . This data was derived from the study "Understanding and Valuing the Marine Ecosystem Services of the Northern Mozambique Channel " by Paulo A.L.D. Nunes and Andrea Ghermandi. This study aimed to understand and value the coastal and marine ecosystem services in the Northern Mozambique Channel region (NMC).
name: Distribution of  Coastal Protection in the NMC region
